title: Adonix
author: Adonix
content: XenonHost.co LTDXenonHost.co is your new favourite for your cloud needs. We launched our hosting platform back in 2020 and going strong. Our motto is to bring cost-effective yet premium cloud hosting solutions to the market. All of our VPS plans come with advanced features like instant upgrades, DDoS protection, Gigabit Uplink and 24/7 Support.We are offering a limited-time discount of 10% Off your first month of the base hosting package on monthly billing terms! Use promo code XHBT10 during checkout. We also offer additional discounts on bulk purchases. Please do contact us for additional enquiries.Anti-DDoS KVM Linux VPS Range: XenonHost DDoS protection is combined with Voxility (Secure Cloud) + Neterra Firewall (Firewall Protection). The filtration capacity is over 1.8 Tbps.XenProtect 1 - 5.99$/m1 vCore CPU4GB RAM20GB SSD | RAID-10Voxility DDoS Protection1Gbps | Unmetered1 IPv4 AddressBulgaria, EUORDER NOWXenProtect 2 -11.99$/m2 vCore CPU6GB RAM30GB SSD | RAID-10Voxility DDoS Protection1Gbps | Unmetered1 IPv4 AddressBulgaria, EUORDER NOWXenProtect 3 - 15.99$/m3 vCore CPU8GB RAM40GB SSD | RAID-10Voxility DDoS Protection1Gbps | Unmetered1 IPv4 AddressBulgaria, EUORDER NOWKVM Linux VPS Range: All our KVM Linux USA VPS are set to affordable rates without compromising the performance.
